p: Many indolofuroquinoxaline derivatives in lemon citrus have displayed promising growth prevention effect against the K562, MDA-MB 231, and MCF7 cell lines, though, no significant effects have been seen on the HEK293 cell line (normal cells), suggesting a selectivity of these derivatives towards cancer cells [ 32]. Studies have shown that lemon and grapefruit peel essential oils showed moderated to weak cytotoxicity against the human prostate (PC-3), lung (A549), and breast (MCF-7) cancer cell lines [ 33]. In lemon juice, the presence of limonene together with other components like alkaloids, phenols, flavonoids, and terpenoids was shown to be responsible for inducing apoptosis and inhibiting angiogenesis in cancer cells [ 6].
